subtitles.subtitle: Chandrayaan-3 becomes first to land on lunar south pole
subtitles.description: ISRO creates history with a soft landing near the moon’s south pole.

subtitles.subtitle: India's space mission inspires global reactions
subtitles.description: Leaders and scientists around the world praise ISRO’s success.

subtitles.subtitle: AI Bot Commentary
subtitles.description: A bot-generated insight on ISRO’s mission and future goals.
subtitles.content: The Chandrayaan-3 mission showcases India’s growing technological capability in space. Next up, a manned mission?
